subjectArea.name: CX - Service Request Milestone
subjectArea.description: This subject area provides information on the Service Request Milestones and how the SR is performing against the same. It also provides the associated Sales Account, the SR Owner, Product and Service Queue related information associated to the SR.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
